text:
Question 163) Many measures can be taken in our homes for the rational use of electricity. This must be a daily attitude of citizenship. One of them may be the reduction of time in the bath. A power shower of 4 800 W consumes 4.8 kW per hour. A person who takes two baths daily, 10 minutes each, will consume, in seven days, how many kW?
A) 0.8
B) 1.6
C) 5.6
D) 11.2
E) 33.6
